name: Knuckleheads
description: Knuckleheads is a full service, idea to app store, mobile shop. We offer our clients full UI/UX/Design, native iOS and Android development, customized analytics and notifications, and all the custom backend tools (CMS/DB) to make everything work seamlessly. We aim to be the “mobile arm” for our clients, allowing them to focus on their core business, while we help them with their mobile roadmap.
